6300730.extract:
Trenton Merricks (/ˈmɛriks/) is a philosopher at the University of Virginia. His main fields are metaphysics, epistemology, and philosophy of religion.


== Works ==
Objects and Persons (Oxford University Press, 2001)
Truth and Ontology (Oxford University Press, 2007)


== See also ==
Mereological nihilism
Philosophy of religion
Growing block universe


== References ==
